about.name: Javier Gonzalez
about.desc-about: My name is Javier Gonzalez, I'm 23 years old and I live in Iquique, Chile. I studied Analista Programador in Inacap. Im learning React, Express, Mongodb and NodeJs (MERN Stack).I love programming and I'd like learn more web technologies to expand my knowledge. Also I like compose and produce music.

slider.poketrainer-desc: PokeTrainer is a site that you can manage your pokemon team

info.info-title: Let's work and create something unique!

footer.design-by: Designed and developed in React by Javier Gonzalez
